title: Can't Killean The Zilean Dance Emote

embed.description: My attempt to make a perfect loop of the Killean Zilean Video made by CrazyBorisProduction http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xpe-JoGyPsY Yes I changed good loop to seamless :P The problem I notice is that the original song is played in a different key/tempo? than the song used in his video.

body: I think little baby boy Zilean deserves a sick dance to make up for his currently dull emotes. And it would be awesome if they added this one to the game from the vid. PLEASE DO IT (also try add the audio) {{champion:26}}

replies.body: I love the videos by CrazyBorisProductions. 10/10 Would love to see that dance implemented :D
